headline: Vote Leave-linked AI firm sold in £740m deal
summary: An artificial intelligence (AI) business that helped provide crucial data to Dominic Cummings’ Vote Leave campaign has been sold in a $1bn (£740m) deal.

raw.headline: Vote Leave-linked AI firm sold in £740m deal
raw.summary: An artificial intelligence (AI) business that helped provide crucial data to Dominic Cummings’ Vote Leave campaign has been sold in a $1bn (£740m) deal.

headline: AI Is ‘Transformative’ for Economy. Duolingo and 5 Other Stocks to Play the Shift.
summary: Is artificial intelligence overhyped?  “We view GenAI as a transformative, general-purpose technology with the potential to change entire industries and work as we know it,” wrote Truist analyst Arvind Ramnani in a research note.  Language-learning platform  Duolingo  consulting outfit  Accenture  tax-preparation business  Intuit  AI-powered lender  Upstart Holdings  and insurance-technology companies  Lemonade  and  CCC Intelligent Solutions  are stocks that will benefit, according to Ramnani.

headline: Compensation Advisory Partners Appoints Lindsey Baker as Chief Marketing Officer
summary: NEW YORK, January 06, 2026--Compensation Advisory Partners (CAP), a national executive compensation consulting firm, today announced the appointment of Lindsey Baker as Chief Marketing Officer. In this newly created role, Ms. Baker will lead CAP’s marketing strategy and business development initiatives to support the firm’s continued growth and market leadership in executive compensation consulting.

headline: Truist Initiates Palantir Stock At Buy On AI, Capital Returns
summary: Truist Securities initiated Palantir stock with a buy rating. It expects higher capital returns for Palantir stock "in the long run."

headline: NTT DOCOMO GLOBAL and Accenture Launch Universal Wallet Infrastructure, Powering the Trusted Future of a Data-Led, AI-Driven Digital Society
summary: TOKYO, January 06, 2026--NTT DOCOMO GLOBAL and Accenture are teaming up to develop and scale the Universal Wallet Infrastructure (UWI).

headline: Is Softer Public-Sector Demand Undermining the Resilience of Accenture’s Consulting Engine (ACN)?
summary: In recent days, Accenture reported second-quarter revenue guidance with a midpoint below analyst expectations and pointed to uneven demand from public sector and government clients trying to rein in spending. This softer outlook from key clients raises fresh questions about the resilience of Accenture’s consulting and technology pipelines just as investors focus on upcoming macro data releases and the March 19 earnings update. Next, we’ll examine how this weaker revenue guidance and uneven...

headline: Accenture to Acquire Faculty to Scale AI Capabilities
summary: LONDON, January 06, 2026--Accenture has agreed to acquire Faculty, a leading UK-based AI native services and products business.
